Landsknechte Doppelsöldner armed with crossbows would lay ranged fire support by the flanks of the pike squares.

This is an Armbrustschützen (Crossbowmen) unit of fifteen strips of two figures each (30 figures total). You will recieve fifteen rank and file strips (a mix of ls04a–e).
